main event: A sighting of a shiny, disc-shaped object was reported near Willcox, Arizona on April 30, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as smooth and silvery,It appeared to be about 50 ft in diameter and 6 ft thick,The object was observed for about 2-3 seconds,The observer was driving alone and had a clear view of the object,The object seemed to have lost its reflection when it resumed a horizontal position.
witness description: the observer was driving alone in a car
